ygData.subject: Re: Quick Keys/Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Just to clarify, I m on a cable modem and my ping times are usually 80-130 ms.  I have *no* trouble twisting three songs, and if I really try hard I can do
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 6 Jul 1999, Abraham Hardjana wrote:
>
> Well so far I have been able to twist three songs together without too
> much difficulty, though I usually lose the buff for a split second. This
> is with a Celeron 450 128MB Ram and a Voodoo2 8MB. Not exactly the
> greatest setup. Though I cannot be one hundred percent sure at times
> because my cable modem connection is really bad. I usually get spikes of
> 70%-80% packet loss at times. Last night I was able to do it in Guk while

Just to clarify, I'm on a cable modem and my ping times are
usually 80-130 ms. I have *no* trouble twisting three songs,
and if I really try hard I can do four maybe every other
round. But once the spells start flying, it's three if I'm
lucky, usually two. I'm running at 1024x768 which probably
doesn't help, but I don't want to give up the high resolution.
:-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
